title: Final Review & Graduation
goal: Self-assess your learning and plan next steps.

Very happy, you succeeded!

What You've Learned (3-4 min)

Grammar Mastery

Category Skills
Foundation Place structure, cu, .i, pronouns
Words ~236 gismu, many cmavo
Compounds Tanru, lujvo, rafsi, bo, ke, co
Abstraction nu, du'u, ka, ni, tu'a
Connectives .e, je, gi'e, ge...gi, joi, ce, ce'o
Tense pu/ca/ba, co'a/ca'o/mo'u, ki, roi
Negation na, na'e, to'e, no'e
Questions xu, ma, mo, xo
Attitudinals .ui, .oi, .ie, .a'o, etc.
Evidentials za'a, pe'i, ti'e
Relative poi, noi, pe, ke'a
Sumtcita ri'a, mu'i, bu'u, pi'o, bau
Quotation lu..li'u, zo, lo'u..le'u
Advanced MEX, pro-bridi, elision

Production Skills

  • Speaking: Basic conversation
  • Writing: Stories, journals, opinions
  • Reading: Parsing complex sentences
  • Listening: Ready to practice

Self-Assessment (5-6 min)

Rate Yourself (1-5)

Skill Rating Notes

List your top 3:

Areas for Improvement

Next Steps (3-4 min)

Continue Learning

  1. Expand Vocabulary

    • Learn more gismu (there are ~1300+)
    • Study common lujvo
    • Learn specialized cmavo

  2. Join the Community

    • IRC: #lojban on Libera Chat
    • Discord: Lojban servers
    • Mailing lists and forums

  3. Read Lojban Texts

    • jbovlaste (dictionary with examples)
    • Translated texts
    • Original Lojban writing

  4. Write Regularly

    • Daily journal
    • Stories
    • Essays and opinions

  5. Speak with Others

    • Voice chat with other Lojbanists
    • Practice conversations
    • Teaching others

  6. Study CLL (Complete Lojban Language)

    • Deep dive into grammar
    • Advanced topics
    • Edge cases

Final Challenge

Write a graduation statement in Lojban:

Include:

  • What you learned
  • How you feel
  • Your future plans
Example 
mi pu cilre la .jbobau. ze'a lo cinoki djedi
.i ca mi djuno so'i da
.i mi ka'e tavla .e ciska .e tcidu
.i .ui sai mi gleki lo nu snada
.i ki'e ro lo sidju
.i mi ba ze'u tadni
.i mi djica lo nu certu
.i .a'o mi ba tavla so'i jbopre
.i la .jbobau. cu melbi je vajni bangu
.i co'o .e'o .ui

(I learned Lojban for 210 days. Now I know many things. I can speak and write and read. Very happy, I'm glad to succeed! Thanks to all helpers. I will study for a long time. I want to be skilled. Hopefully I will talk to many Lojbanists. Lojban is a beautiful and important language. Goodbye, please, happy!)

Graduation Certificate
